languages.text: Стандартный алтарь со встроенной вокс-записью имперского богослужения. Из динамиков доносятся жуткие звуки, которые ныне стали злой пародией на благородную литургию.

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] Когда-то это был алтарь с автоматической системой воспроизведения аудио-проповедей. Теперь из него сочится скверна и доносятся богохульные завывания.

languages.text: This altar would be unremarkable if not for the uncanny sounds streaming from its built-in speakers. What once was a vox-recording of a liturgical service is now a malevolent parody of the noble faith.
languages.original_text: Стандартный алтарь со встроенной вокс-записью имперского богослужения. Из динамиков доносятся жуткие звуки, которые ныне стали злой пародией на благородную литургию.

traits.locale_text: This altar would be unremarkable if not for the uncanny sounds streaming from its built-in speakers. What once was a vox-recording of an Imperial liturgical service is now a malevolent parody of the noble faith.

This altar would be unremarkable if not for the uncanny sounds streaming from its built-in speakers. What once was a vox-recording of an Imperial liturgical service is now a malevolent parody of the noble faith.

This altar would be unremarkable if not for the uncanny sounds streaming from its built-in speakers. What once was a vox-recording of an Imperial liturgical service is now a malevolent parody of the noble faith.

This altar would be unremarkable if not for the uncanny sounds streaming from its built-in speakers. What once was a vox-recording of a liturgical service is now a malevolent parody of the noble faith.

languages.text: 祭坛内置的扬声器中发出了古怪的声音，使得这座原本平平无奇的祭坛变得极其引人注目。像这样的音阵装置，原本用于举行礼拜仪式，但如今却成了对崇高信仰的恶意嘲弄。
languages.original_text: This altar would be unremarkable if not for the uncanny sounds streaming from its built-in speakers. What once was a vox-recording of a liturgical service is now a malevolent parody of the noble faith.

traits.locale_text: 祭坛内置的扬声器中发出了古怪的声音，使得这座原本平平无奇的祭坛变得极其引人注目。像这样的音阵装置，原本是用于帝国的礼拜仪式的，但如今却成了对崇高信仰的恶意嘲弄。

languages.text: Este altar no sería digno de mención de no ser por los inquietantes sonidos que emiten sus altavoces integrados. Lo que una vez fuera una grabación de voco de un servicio litúrgico es ahora una malévola parodia de la noble fe.
languages.original_text: This altar would be unremarkable if not for the uncanny sounds streaming from its built-in speakers. What once was a vox-recording of a liturgical service is now a malevolent parody of the noble faith.

traits.locale_text: Este altar no sería digno de mención de no ser por los inquietantes sonidos que emiten sus altavoces integrados. Lo que una vez fuera una grabación de voco de un servicio litúrgico imperial es ahora una malévola parodia de la noble fe.

languages.text: 内蔵スピーカーから漏れる不気味な音がなければ、この祭壇が人の耳目を集めることはないだろう。かつては典礼のヴォクス・レコーディングだったものが、今では高貴な信仰の悪趣味なパロディとなっている。
languages.original_text: This altar would be unremarkable if not for the uncanny sounds streaming from its built-in speakers. What once was a vox-recording of a liturgical service is now a malevolent parody of the noble faith.

traits.locale_text: 内蔵スピーカーから漏れる不気味な音がなければ、この祭壇が人の耳目を集めることはないだろう。かつては典礼のヴォクス・レコーディングだったものが、今では高貴な信仰の悪趣味なパロディとなっている。

languages.text: Cet autel passerait totalement inaperçu sans les sons troublants qui s'échappent de ses enceintes intégrées. Ce qui était auparavant l'enregistrement-vox d'une messe liturgique ne ressemble plus qu'à une parodie malveillante de cette noble foi.
languages.original_text: This altar would be unremarkable if not for the uncanny sounds streaming from its built-in speakers. What once was a vox-recording of a liturgical service is now a malevolent parody of the noble faith.

traits.locale_text: Cet autel passerait totalement inaperçu sans les sons troublants qui s'échappent de ses enceintes intégrées. Ce qui était autrefois l'enregistrement-vox d'une messe liturgique impériale ne ressemble plus qu'à une parodie malveillante de cette noble foi.

languages.text: Der Altar wäre nicht weiter bemerkenswert, kämen nicht aus seinen eingebauten Lautsprechern unheimliche Geräusche. Was einst eine Vox-Aufzeichnung einer Liturgie war, ist nun eine boshafte Parodie des edlen Glaubens.
languages.original_text: This altar would be unremarkable if not for the uncanny sounds streaming from its built-in speakers. What once was a vox-recording of a liturgical service is now a malevolent parody of the noble faith.

traits.locale_text: Der Altar wäre nicht weiter bemerkenswert, kämen nicht aus seinen eingebauten Lautsprechern unheimliche Geräusche. Was einst eine Vox-Aufzeichnung einer imperialen Liturgie war, ist nun eine boshafte Parodie des edlen Glaubens.

languages.text: Sunak, dâhilî hoparlöründen gelen esrarlı ses haricinde epey alelade duruyor. Bir zamanlar ibadet amaçlı kullanılan voks kaydı, artık soylu bir inancın kötücül bir parodisinden ibaret kalmış.
languages.original_text: This altar would be unremarkable if not for the uncanny sounds streaming from its built-in speakers. What once was a vox-recording of a liturgical service is now a malevolent parody of the noble faith.

traits.locale_text: Sunak oldukça özelliksiz duruyor. Dâhili hoparlöründen gelen esrarlı ses haricinde. Bir zamanlar ibadet amaçlı kullanılan voks kaydı, artık soylu inanışın kötücül bir parodisinden ibaret.
